alert.note: Alert for Grafton; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:42PM EDT until August 08 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sullivan County in central New Hampshire... Southwestern Grafton County in northern New Hampshire... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 642 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lebanon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Grafton, Hanover, Enfield, Canaan, Groton, Grantham, Lyme, Cornish, Hebron, Dorchester, Plainfield, Orange and Wentworth. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 46 and 60. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
